br.uff.midiacom.ana
Class NCLBody<Pt extends NCLPort,Pp extends NCLProperty,N extends NCLNode,L extends NCLLink,M extends NCLMeta,MT extends NCLMetadata>

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLElement
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLIdentifiableElement
              br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLBody<Pt,Pp,N,L,M,MT>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, IdentifiableElement, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLBody<Pt extends NCLPort,Pp extends NCLProperty,N extends NCLNode,L extends NCLLink,M extends NCLMeta,MT extends NCLMetadata>
extends NCLIdentifiableElement

Esta classe define o elemento body da Nested Context Language (NCL). Este elemento é o elemento que define o corpo de um documento NCL.

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
